text.name: sys_description
text.text: Solarus is a game engine specifically designed to create Action RPGs. Similar to cult 2D era games such as "Zelda: A Link to the Past" or "Secret of Mana" on Super Nintendo, or "Soleil" on Sega Megadrive. But it also uses OpenGL to display modern graphics effects. To design a quest, just script it in Lua. As the quest creator you will have to define the logic of the game. Your Lua scripts describe the behavior of enemies, or what happens when you press a switch, on a specific map. They will also be used to implement the title screen and the HUD (information on the screen).
